/************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 * @file Ex_11_6.cpp
 * @brief Exercise 11.6: Explain the difference between a set and a list. When might you use one or the other?
 * @date 2024-01-09
 * 
 * @copyright Copyright (c) 2024
 * 
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/

set, associative container in which key is its value, provides quicker search for keys
    ex : set of vowels
list, a doubly linked list, where each element will contain links to predecessor, successor and value. 
    ex : a list of tourist places
